title: The Untiring Vigilance of Ling Bell
summary: Ling Bell, a 68-year-old superhero with a penchant for training and assisting, discovers a plot to overthrow the city, which she thwarts over one action-packed week.
summaryGerman: Ling Bell, eine 68-jährige Superheldin mit einer Vorliebe für Training und Unterstützung, entdeckt eine Verschwörung zur Übernahme der Stadt, die sie innerhalb einer aktionsreichen Woche vereitelt.
summaryDutch: Ling Bell, een 68-jarige superheld met een voorliefde voor training en bijstand, ontdekt een complot om de stad over te nemen, wat ze binnen één actievolle week verijdelt.
summaryFrench: Ling Bell, une super-héroïne de 68 ans passionnée par l'entraînement et l'assistance, découvre un complot pour renverser la ville, qu'elle déjoue au cours d'une semaine pleine d'action.

story.text: Ling Bell starts her week by training young heroes at the local gym, unaware of the sinister meeting happening across town.
She overhears a suspicious plan while helping at a community center. Uncertain, she decides to keep a watchful eye.
Using her remarkable detective skills, Ling tracks the conspirators to a hidden warehouse. She's determined but cautious.
Ling gathers evidence and recruits her trusted allies. A plan is starting to form, setting the stage for a daring confrontation.
During the night, Ling and her team stealthily prevent a major attack intended to disrupt the city's main power grid.
The city is bustling with life as usual, all thanks to Ling’s efforts, though hardly anyone knows it. Ling feels content yet focused for more.
A peaceful train ride turns into a chance encounter with the recently thwarted villain. Ling’s calm demeanor discourages any further conflict.

ending: In the quiet twilight of Sunday, Ling Bell smiles, knowing the city is safe once more.
moral: Everlasting vigilance is the cost of peace.
